mapper.select: SELECT V.NO, V.ALLTAG, V.CODE, V.TITLE, V.ADDRESS, V.ROADADDRESS, V.TAG, V.INTRODUCTION, V.PHONENO, V.LATITUDE, V.LONGITUDE, V.IMGPATH, V.AVG_RATE, R.NO AS R_NO, R.VNO AS R_VNO, R.CONTENT AS R_CONTENT, U.NAME AS R_NAME, R.CREATE_DATE AS R_CREATE_DATE, R.MODIFY_DATE AS R_MODIFY_DATE FROM VISIT_JEJU V LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW R ON (V.NO = R.VNO) LEFT OUTER JOIN USER U ON (R.UNO = U.NO) WHERE V.NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW(NO, VNO, UNO, RATE, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES(0, #{vno}, #{uno}, #{rate}, #{content}, #{createDate}, #{modifyDate})
